MSIL 會做為在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器的輸入。MSIL is used as input to a just-in-time (JIT) compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`opcode`參數需要一個引數，呼叫端必須確保引數長度符合宣告參數的長度。If the `opcode` parameter requires an argument, the caller must ensure that the argument length matches the length of the declared parameter. 否則，您將無法預測結果。Otherwise, results will be unpredictable. 比方說，如果發出指令需要 2 個位元組的運算元，而且呼叫端提供 4 個位元組的運算元，則執行階段就會發出指令資料流的兩個額外的位元組。For example, if the Emit instruction requires a 2-byte operand and the caller supplies a 4-byte operand, the runtime will emit two additional bytes to the instruction stream. 這些額外的位元組會指示。These extra bytes will be instructions. 指示的值會定義在。The instruction values are defined in . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`Emit`產生的執行個體透過 MSIL 輸出。The code sample below demonstrates the use of `Emit` to generate MSIL output via an instance of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示的值會定義在`OpCodes`列舉型別。The instruction values are defined in the `OpCodes` enumeration. 使用建立標籤，且其資料流中的位置固定使用。Labels are created using , and their location within the stream is fixed by using . 如果使用單一位元組的指令，則標籤可以代表沿著資料流最多 127 個位元組的跳躍點。If a single-byte instruction is used, the label can represent a jump of at most 127 bytes along the stream. `opcode` 必須代表分支指令。`opcode` must represent a branch instruction. 分支是相對的指示，因為`label`會取代在修復程序期間以分支的正確位移。Because branches are relative instructions, `label` will be replaced with the correct offset to branch during the fixup process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有跳躍表的動態方法。The code sample below illustrates the creation of a dynamic method with a jump table. 使用陣列來建置跳躍表格。The jump table is built using an array of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是透明的並可從部分信任程式碼呼叫。This method is transparent, and can be called from partially trusted code. 如果之前在發出任何 MSIL 指令，存取屬性，它會傳回 0 （零）。If the property is accessed before any MSIL instructions have been emitted, it returns 0 (zero). 動態語言產生 MSIL 時，此屬性可用來將 MSIL 資料流中的位移對應至來源的程式碼行號。When MSIL is generated for dynamic languages, this property can be used to map offsets in the MSIL stream to source code line numbers. 產生的資訊可用來擲回例外狀況時提供堆疊追蹤。The resulting information can be used to provide stack traces when exceptions are thrown.
